faq_1.question: Can I start classes immediately?
faq_1.answer: Yes, you can book your free trial now and start within 48 hours. Our team will contact you to confirm the time and teacher.

faq_2.question: What are the technical requirements?
faq_2.answer: You only need a computer, tablet or smartphone and a stable internet connection. We use Zoom or Google Meet.

faq_3.question: Is there a long-term contract?
faq_3.answer: No, you can cancel anytime. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

faq_4.question: What about beginners who do not speak Arabic?
faq_4.answer: Our teachers speak multiple languages and can explain clearly. Start with a free trial and we will assess the level.

faq_5.question: Are the sessions recorded?
faq_5.answer: Yes, sessions are recorded in certain plans and you can review them whenever you need.

faq_6.question: Do you offer family discounts?
faq_6.answer: Yes, when more than one student from the same family enrols, you can get up to 20% discount.
